Uses of Class
Entities.Movie

  • Packages that use Movie 
    Package Description
    Manager  

    • Uses of Movie in Manager

      Methods in Manager that return Movie 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Movie MovieManager.addMovie(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String showingStatus, java.lang.String synopsis, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String cast)
      This method adds a new movie while taking in the movie listing details.
      Movie MovieManager.getMovieObject(java.lang.String title)
      This method returns the movie object by matching the object with the inputed movie title.
      Movie MovieManager.setOverallRating(Movie movie)
      This method sets the overall rating for a particular movie.
      Methods in Manager that return types with arguments of type Movie 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Movie> MovieManager.getMovieList()
      This method returns the list of all movie objects.
      Methods in Manager with parameters of type Movie 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean MovieManager.removeMovie(Movie movie)
      This method performs the removing of a movie based on the inputed movie object.
      Movie MovieManager.setOverallRating(Movie movie)
      This method sets the overall rating for a particular movie.
      void MovieManager.updateRating(Movie movie, double rating)
      This method updates the rating of the movie.
      void MovieManager.updateReview(Movie movie, java.lang.String review)
      This method updates the review of the movie.
